alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 24 at 2:37PM AKDT until March 27 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 4 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, blowing snow, and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 1 AM Saturday to 4 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility down to one quarter mile or less at times. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
